title: Transfer account to nordic east
body:
Hi,
I'm not seeing any options to transfer my account to other continents. Additionally I cannot log in to support for some reason.

Regards,
Cyklon

replies.body:
You should be able to find account transfers in the store under account settings. 

https://i.gyazo.com/498d3c43c1ec3f9e76cb6a24e8e84ccf.png
